page.title: 14WADEBRIDGE-NEW SEWERAGE
page.content: Wadebridge has needed a proper sewage system because most of the sewage was pumped into the river causing{ {pollution}.The work began in 1982 on the construction of new sewers and treatment works. They started digging up the roads to lay pipes in{Jan.1982} and finished in{Jan 1985}.This work caused serious traffic problems in the town .The {The treatment works at Polgammon}was started in{Oct.1982}and completed in{ {July 1985}.The total cost was about{ {Â£4.3m} The contractors({E.Thomas & co.})have laid{27 km}of{pipes}and constructed {3 {Pumping stations},(two small ones at Sladebridge and Egloshayle)and the main one near the abbatoir. The{treatment works}is a fully automated biological system which needs no full time attendant.
